about.title: About Yiyang Marine Service
about.subtitle: Professional Marine Engineering Team
about.description: With years of marine engineering experience, we are committed to providing the highest quality services to our clients

content.paragraph1: Yiyang Marine Service has quickly established itself as a leading provider of maintenance and repair services for luxury cruise ships and superyachts, with a special focus on the Asian market.
content.paragraph2: Our team of certified marine engineers, technicians and craftsmen is committed to maintaining the highest standards of quality and precision, ensuring that every vessel we service maintains its value, safety and luxury appeal.
content.paragraph3: We are particularly proud of our work on China's first domestically built large cruise ship, the Adora Magic City, where we provided exceptional mechanical system upgrades and luxury interior refurbishment.
